message:
My friends i have been working on this project for a while and i would love to show it to you first and have your help in testing it and finding what should i enhance more and what should i totally remove. 
the project url is www.pensqr.com and as it is still beta and private here is a full access code Pri859
please feel free to invite any of your friends who can help us with that and can help spreading the word.
Thanks x 3
name: Pensqr - Connects you to what always matter
caption: www.pensqr.com
description: a fun, organized & visualized space for people who share the same passion amd interest about something.

data.message:
Here are my thoughts

1. I like the idea & design. What I'm missing is: what would make a normal user register in your site & ignore similar websites, e.g. pinterest, delicious, etc? This is the most important question that you need to answer.

2. You're doing a good job of caching images, progressive loading of "pens", using S3, but there are still some issues related to performance.

3. On this page http://www.pensqr.com/8/k_roushdy/, the background image takes a lot of time to load, because it's 1.5MB. Also, png is not the correct format for such an image. IMHO, the best is to use CSS gradient.

4. Your bundled JS file contains multiple copies of the used libraries (classie, bootstrap, jQuery form, etc).

I hope the best for you, guys

that was really helpful Thanks Mohammad Tayseer 
1) did you get the difference in Pensqr of the message is not clear ? 
2) we are working on the performance specially the speed of website loading an please feel free to give me tips on how to do so
3) I will remove multiples in js, it seems assetic management doubled some js files

1. The difference was not clear
2. I gave a session before about front-end optimizations. Find below video & slides
